description: PRAGATI: PM Modi reviews progress towards handling and resolution of grievances related to Railways PRAGATI: PM calls for strictest possible action against Railway officials found guilty of corruptio
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Today’s PRAGATI session had extensive deliberations on railways, infrastructure projects & Swachhta Action Plans.  Discussed ways to improve uptake of immunisation programmes at districts where it is not happening at a quick enough pace.

On AMRUT Mission, highlighted ways through which latest technology can be invigorated in the efforts towards modernising our cities. 
http://nm-4.com/u8r4
